title: Save Mayrina
content:
two brothers set off after her - determined to find their sister Mayrina. Something isn't right here. We saw through the illusion that hid the area, revealing a stinking, nightmarish place.

Auntie Ethel waved her hand and Mayrina vanished. What happened to her? The fireplace revealed ahidden passage under Auntie Ethel's home - leading to a dark, twisted lair.

We found Auntie Ethel in the heart of her lair. She's furious with us. We're in for a fight.

Speak with Mayrina.
